creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Sleeveless Robe of deep blue silk with design of moth butterflies in k'ossu heavily painted. Border of black satin, embroidered with floral sprays in satin stitch in shades of blue, and set off from body by a strip of multi-colored brocade braid. Lining of thin pink silk. Companion to 42.8.79.
dimension: L.51-1/2 in.; L.48-1/4 in. to collar.
title: Sleeveless Robe
